19 16 6 5 1-3 years toddler 18 20 18 7 3-10 years child 19 21 20 7 5 teen/small adult 21 22 21 8 men/large adult 23 24 22 8 5 pattern instructions brim r1 rs chain 6 single_crochet in 2nd chain from the hook and in each chain across turn 5 sts r2 ws chain 1 does not count as a st throughout single_crochet blo in each st across turn 5 sts r3 r50 repeat r2 the band measures approximately 20 inches without stretching do not fasten_off place both short ends together rs facing in slip_stitch closed through both loops in each st of the brim ends do not fasten_off turn brim inside out so the right side is facing out and slip_stitch end is facing in continue with the body of the beanie body note the brim has 50 row so for r1 you will add 2 sts r1 chain 1 single_crochet 52 evenly into the side of each row of the brim around do not slip_stitch to join continue working in the rounds remember to pm in the first st 52 sts r2 single_crochet in 1st st half_double_crochet in last st from the previous round skip 1 st *single_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in skipped st skip 1 st* repeat from * to * around 52 sts strings and cuddles copyright 2023 arise beanie 4 r3 skip marked st single_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in skipped marked st skip 1 st *single_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in skipped st skip 1 st* repeat from * to * around 52 sts keep repeating r3 until your piece measures approximately 8 inches now continue with shaping the crown of your beanie decreases shaping the crown r4 decrease around see special stitch 26 sts r5 repeat r4 13 sts finishing fasten_off leaving a long tail approximately 12 inches for closing the top of the beanie with the long tail yarn and tapestry needle thread through the sts around to close the top thread through the sts for the second time then pull tight to cinch closed fasten_off and weave in all ends add your favorite pompom for a finishing touch and you are done strings and cuddles copyright 2023
